headline: 3 Dividend Stocks Down 2%, 7%, and 10% to Buy Before the New Year
summary: If your objectives include generating passive income, then you've come to the right place.  Freeport-McMoRan (NYSE: FCX), York Water (NASDAQ: YORW), and PepsiCo (NASDAQ: PEP) have all tumbled this year while the broader indexes are hovering around all-time highs.  Here's what makes all three dividend stocks compelling buys before the new year.

summary: We recently published a list of Billionaire Stanley Druckenmiller’s Top 10 Stock Picks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Freeport-McMoRan Inc.
